---
id: update-workspace-participant-role
title: "Update workspace participant role"
description: "Updates the role of the participant identified by the given `participantId` in the given workspace. Accepts `owner`, `admin`, `maintain`, `launch`, `connect`, `view`."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update workspace participant role"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/workspaces/{workspaceId}/participants/{participantId}/role"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the role of the participant identified by the given `participantId` in the given workspace. Accepts `owner`, `admin`, `maintain`, `launch`, `connect`, `view`.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
